item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: Setup R Python Scalar Multiplication R Rcpp Python Matrix-Vector Multiplication R Rcpp Python Vector-Matrix Multiplication Environment This post was last updated on 2018-12-02. Setup R Base R r_mat <- matrix(c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9), nrow = 3, ncol = 3) r_mat #> [,1] [,2] [,3] #> [1,] 1 4 7 #> [2,] 2 5 8 #> [3,] 3 6 9 Python NumPy import numpy as np np_mat = np.

item.title: Variance and Standard Deviation
item.description: What is it? Variance Translation Standard Deviation Translation R Base R Rcpp Sugar RcppArmadillo Custom Template Python Pure Python NumPy CuPy Shootout Environment This post was last updated on 2018-12-02. What is it? Variance \[Var(x) = \sigma^2 = \frac{\sum(x_i - \mu_x)^2} {N-1}\] or… \[Var(x) = s^2 = \frac{\sum(x_i - \bar{x})^2} {n-1}\] \(x_i\): for each i in x \(\mu_x\) and \(\bar{x}\): arithmetic mean of the values in \(x\) \(N\) and \(n\): number of observations in \(x\) \(\sum\): sum Translation \[\textbf{variance} ~←~ \frac{\textbf{sum}(~(~\textbf{for}~i~\textbf{in}~x: i -\textbf{mean}(x)~)^2~)} {\textbf{length}(x) - 1}\]

item.title: Mean
item.description: R Base R Rcpp Sugar Custom Blueprint Templated RcppParallel Python Pure Python NumPy Numba Parallel CuPy Shootout Environment R Base R r_vector <- c(126, 793, 999, 525, 851, 798, 120, 714, 852, 151, 190, 41, 612, 826, 507, 105, 14, 237, 669, 7) mean(r_vector) #> [1] 456.85 Rcpp Sugar #include <Rcpp.h> // [[Rcpp::export]] double rcpp_sugar_mean(Rcpp::NumericVector x) { return Rcpp::mean(x); } r_vector <- c(126, 793, 999, 525, 851, 798, 120, 714, 852, 151, 190, 41, 612, 826, 507, 105, 14, 237, 669, 7) rcpp_sugar_mean(r_vector) #> [1] 456.

item.title: Median
item.description: What is it? R Base R Custom Base R Rcpp Sugar Custom Blueprint Templated Python Pure Python NumPy Numba Parallel CuPy Shootout Environment What is it? Given a sequence, which is the middle-most value. Put another way, what value is equally likely to be greater than the first half of a sorted sequence and lesser than the second half of a sorted sequence.
